title: It’s Time to Push Back | Guests: Will Hild & Tim Phillips | 5/21/21
description:
Glenn and Stu can’t get enough of Consumers’ Research’s commercials attacking woke companies like Coca-Cola and American Airlines. A Russian woman killed her husband by suffocating him with her butt. Will Hild, executive director of Consumers’ Research, joins to discuss the organization's ads targeting woke companies and CEOs. Unsilenced Majority’s Mike Davis shares how the group is helping Americans push back against cancel culture. Moms for Liberty’s Robin Steenman shares her fight against critical race theory in schools. Glenn previews his podcast with Voddie Baucham about how to defeat CRT. Americans for Prosperity President Tim Phillips shares how bad both political parties have been on spending and what we can do to fight back.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
itunes:subtitle: Glenn and Stu hear from multiple groups pushing back against wokeness in our government, businesses, culture, and schools.
